name: Free-Bees
description:
Controls
[A & D, Arrows, or Controller] - Move the paddle left and right
[Space] - Launch the bee off your paddle

Instructions
🐝 Hit the hexagon with bees in them to free them, they'll join your chain
🍯 Hexagons with honey on them are, well, sticky!
☠️Don't let the bees touch the bottom...
 ⬡  Break all the hexagons to win!! 
🖥️ Full-screen advised


Credits
Free-Bees is a game made by Alex, Elspeth, & Lloyd for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 for the theme "Joined Together"
#HexagonsAreTheBestagons
